item.title: Now Hiring: Postdoctoral Researcher!
item.description: Building Conservation Archetypes for western North America Job Summary A Postdoctoral Researcher position is available for a project funded by the Wilburforce Foundation to characterize archetypal patterns of wildlife conservation and conflict across western North America (see project description here). We seek a social-ecological systems scientist or quantitative social scientist to lead data analysis and publication primary research and support outreach to conservation partners and funders.
